A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie takes everything we know and love about starwars\, its heroes\, its plot and shits on it. And its not just me talking\, millions are complaining about the same thing. The plot is inconsistent dribble with plot holes\, its badly written\, badly acted and badly put together. \nYou'd think\, with unlimited funding and resources you'd conjure a decent movie worthy of the franchise.. instead we get a sci-fi version of the room. \nSuch a waste\, won't be seeing the third installment in theaters.
